full_summary:
**12 Gauge Shotgun Ammunition Plastic Body**
=====================================================

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**
-----------------------------------

**Notice Reference:** PW-__BK-370-28781
**Notice Date:** August 19, 2022

**Bid Closes:** October 13, 2022, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Notice Amendment:** Refer to PW-__BK-370-28781/1-GOB

**Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Nature of Requirements:**
=========================

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires 12 gauge shotgun ammunition with a plastic body, 2¾ inch length, maximum dram equivalent, 1 ¼ oz. No. 4 buck.

**Bid Requirements:**
==================

The CSC is seeking suppliers to submit a bid for the above-mentioned requirements. Suppliers must submit a bid in accordance with the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement and the associated rules and regulations.

**Delivery Schedule:**
=====================

The Contractor will grant to Canada two (2) one (1) year irrevocable options.

**Delivery Terms:**
==================

Delivery is expected above-mentioned.

**Submission Requirements:**
==========================

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Solicitation Number:**
=====================

21120-231376/A

**Contact Information:**
=====================

Joanne Ruest (Ruest(370BK))
Phone: (819) 360-7799
Email: [joanne.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Attachments:**

A list of documents submitted with this notice can be found at the following URLs:

* [Link 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/18/f6d37e8ad5fcc7efbf52dbbc6601b381/ABES.PROD.PW__BK.B370.E28781.EBSU000.PDF)
